response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment-grade solution designed to streamline your operations and significantly enhance your business efficiency. Given its value and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than what it costs to acquire. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive setup package and a dedicated onboarding session with our expert team. Would you like to proceed with this offer?", "product_price": 12000}
